definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Flat clappers made of bone or wood originally used by the end man in a minstrel show.
sentences.chinese: 打拍者巡遊演出中站在一端敲擊骨制或木製響板的人。

sentences.english: May I please play the castanets ?
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙老師，我可以拍響板嗎？

sentences.english: Finally Heracles resorted to some castanets given to him by the goddess Athena.
sentences.chinese: 終於海格從雅典娜女神那裏得到了一些能發聲的響板。
